meanings.definition: The action of killing a king.
meanings.sent1: The regicides shocked the kingdom with their crime.
meanings.sent2: The regicides plotted to overthrow the king.
meanings.sent3: The regicides accidentally spilled ink on the royal decree.
meanings.sent4: The regicides of trust left a scar on the monarchy.
meanings.sent5: The regicides' betrayal echoed through history.

meanings.definition: A person who kills a king.
meanings.sent1: The regicides were captured and brought to justice.
meanings.sent2: The regicides were feared by all rulers.
meanings.sent3: The regicides comically tripped over their own swords.
meanings.sent4: The regicides of tyranny were hailed as heroes by some.
meanings.sent5: The regicides' faces haunted the dreams of the royal family.
